price: (56) And We certainly showed him [i.e., Pharaoh] Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
